data.name: Avanzar
data.detailed_description:
Avanzar is a fast-paced FPS Roguelike set in an ancient Aztecan temple.

Stack up unique, synergistic weapon upgrades and shoot your way through the procedurally generated temple.

Master the advanced movement mechanics to gain an edge over the temple guardians and treat the rooms as your playground!
data.about_the_game:
Avanzar is a fast-paced FPS Roguelike set in an ancient Aztecan temple.

Stack up unique, synergistic weapon upgrades and shoot your way through the procedurally generated temple.

Master the advanced movement mechanics to gain an edge over the temple guardians and treat the rooms as your playground!
data.short_description: Avanzar is a fast-paced FPS Roguelike set in an ancient Aztecan temple. Overcome the guardians of the temple by stacking up unique weapon upgrades and mastering the advanced movement mechanics in order to reach the heart of the ever-changing temple.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2nd-Generation 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX650 or equivalent with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
